bibl.title: Papyrology and the Study of Greek Language. Comments on the Thematic Session.
Proceedings of the 20th International Congress of Papyrologists
bibl.author: EBBESEN, Sten

bibl.note: L'auteur, qui a présidé la session thématique "Papyrology and the Study of Greek Language" en remplacement d'Hélène CADELL, répond aux exposés de Johannes KRAMER, pp. 71-80, de G.H.R. HORSLEY, pp. 48-70 et de Franco MONTANARI, pp. 81-88.
EBBESEN Sten, Papyrology and the Study of Greek Language. Comments on the Thematic Session.
Proceedings of the 20th International Congress of Papyrologists (Copenhagen, 1994) pp. 95-97.
